history.proof: symmetry. hauto lq: on use: Rmult_1_l, Rmult_0_l, Cmod_1, Ropp_0, Cmult_comm, Rmult_1_r, Rplus_0_r unfold: Rminus, C, Cmult, fst, RtoC, Cmod, snd.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RtoC_mult (RtoC (_ * _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rmult_1_r (_ * 1)%R does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment x : C Unable to unify "x * 1" with "x".

original: symmetry. rewrite RtoC_mult. rewrite Rmult_1_r. reflexivity.
